question: Which paper shows that in instruction tuning, the instructions can be compressed to small supporting sets of words that provide useful information?
answer_format: Your answer should be the title of the paper WITHOUT ANY EXPLANATION.

eval_kwargs.question: Which paper shows that in instruction tuning, the instructions can be compressed to small supporting sets of words that provide useful information?
eval_kwargs.reference_answer: Did You Read the Instructions? Rethinking the Effectiveness of Task Definitions in Instruction Learning
